variants.name: black
variants.description: This dark hat, favored by rogue pirates, is said to grant its wearer the ability to blend into the shadows and move unseen among enemies.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: Crafted with the deepest blue silks, this hat symbolizes the vast ocean, offering protection and guidance to sailors and adventurers alike.

variants.name: bluegray
variants.description: This bluegray hat is imbued with the tempestuous power of storm clouds, granting the wearer control over winds and lightning.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: Made from rugged leather, this brown hat offers durability and resilience, echoing the steadfast qualities of the earth itself.

variants.name: charcoal
variants.description: This charcoal-colored hat is favored by mystics for its ability to conceal thoughts and intentions, shrouded as if by mist.

variants.name: forest
variants.description: Adorned with leaves and vines, this green hat protects those who wander into the forest, blending perfectly with its surroundings.

variants.name: gray
variants.description: This gray hat is often worn by travelers and nomads, offering protection from the elements and a touch of wisdom from the road.

variants.name: green
variants.description: Vibrant and alluring, this green hat is said to enhance the magical abilities of its wearer, particularly in spells involving nature and life.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: This softly colored lavender hat is favored by artists and dreamers, enhancing creativity and calming the mind.

variants.name: leather
variants.description: Crafted from high-quality leather, this hat offers robust protection and a classic look, ideal for adventurers and bandits alike.

variants.name: maroon
variants.description: This richly colored maroon hat exudes a regal aura, often worn by nobles and high-ranking officers during ceremonial occasions.

variants.name: navy
variants.description: Deep as the midnight sea, this navy hat is perfect for covert operations, providing excellent cover in darkness.

variants.name: orange
variants.description: This bright orange hat captures the essence of the sun, offering warmth and light to all who wear it.

variants.name: pink
variants.description: Soft and subtle, this pink hat is said to carry the whispers of love and friendship, strengthening bonds and soothing conflicts.

variants.name: purple
variants.description: This purple hat is imbued with mystical energies, favored by sorcerers and diviners for its enhancement of psychic and magical powers.

variants.name: red
variants.description: This striking red hat is a symbol of authority and power, often worn by military commanders to boost morale and intimidate foes.

variants.name: rose
variants.description: Decorated with rose petals, this hat is a favorite among romantics, believed to attract true love and passion.

variants.name: sky
variants.description: Light as the sky itself, this hat grants a sense of freedom and liberation, inspiring its wearer to pursue their dreams unbound.

variants.name: slate
variants.description: This slate-colored hat is as tough as stone, providing solid protection and a grounded presence to those who face adversity.

variants.name: tan
variants.description: This tan hat is made for the open road, offering durability and comfort to those who wander far from home.

variants.name: teal
variants.description: Reflecting the color of shallow waters, this teal hat is cherished by seafarers for its ability to keep them safe on their journeys across the sea.

variants.name: walnut
variants.description: This walnut-colored hat, crafted from fine woods, is renowned for its ability to enhance the wisdom and decision-making skills of its wearer.

variants.name: white
variants.description: Pure and simple, this white hat symbolizes peace and hope, often worn by diplomats and peacemakers during negotiations.

variants.name: yellow
variants.description: This bright yellow hat shines like the sun, inspiring joy and confidence in all who see it, enhancing the wearer's charisma and leadership qualities.
